name: repechage
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a practice in some sports in which players or teams who come very close but fail to get through to the next round of a competition are allowed to continue to the next round, often after winning an additional race or game; one additional race or game in such a system: It will be interesting to see how the team do in repechage. the repechage system The women's eight were eliminated, finishing fifth in a repechage from which four boats qualified for the final.
